item.description:
Ladies & Gentleman the time has come. The 2011 AFL Grand Final will again be shown live in Boston this year. This is the ONLY place you can watch the game live AND we will be showing the Grand Final Footy Show starting at 9pm. Bounce down is at 12am.

As always we will have Aussie food, prizes, music and good times. There is a parking garage next door as well as full restaurant and bowling in the vicinity if you want to come down earlier. So don your favorite teams jumper, bring your mates and get along for what is the greatest sporting event in the world!

More details here:

https://www.facebook.com/bostondemons#!/event.php?eid=272257422803794

group.name: The Boston Expat Aussie Meetup Group

item.name: The Boston Demons present 2011 AFL Grand Final - LIVE!
